content: Nati Linial : Home page Nathan (Nati) Linial School of Computer Science and Engineering The Hebrew University of Jerusalem Jerusalem 91904 Israel email: nati@cs.huji.ac.il phone: +972-2-5494548 fax: +972-2-5494548 I am a Professor at the School of Computer Science and Engineering, in the Hebrew University of Jerusalem.
